flavor_text: When Reuniclus shake hands a network forms between their brains increasing their psychic power.
These remarkably intelligent Pokemon fight by controlling arms that can grip with rock-crushing power.
They use psychic power to control their arms which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.
